data.title: Teachers / KA
data.text: Mrs. Carol John was raised in Farmers Branch and attended Chapel Hill as a child. She graduated from W.T. White and The University of Texas with a degree in Business. Her husband and her raised our two girls in the area and they both attended Cabell. Both of her daughters are married. Melissa lives in Coppell and Lauren lives in Weatherford. Lauren teaches High School Math and Melissa is a Speech Language Pathologist. Mrs. John and her husband live in Carrollton and enjoy the company of their grandchildren. They have 3 grandchildren; Trevor (6), Olivia (17 months) and Sierra (14 months old). Mrs. John enjoys walking, doing jazzercise and spending time outdoors and with our dogs.
